article_title: Carolinas HealthCare CEO Michael Tarwater says growth powers system’s mission
article_text: As CEO of Carolinas HealthCare System since 2002, Michael Tarwater has overseen an explosion of growth for the $8 billion hospital system that includes 40 hospitals and more than 530 doctors’ offices in the Carolinas.

article_metadata.title: Carolinas HealthCare CEO Michael Tarwater says growth powers system’s mission | The Charlotte Observer
